briefTitle: Closed Suction Drainage and Natural Drainage of the Pancreatic Duct in Pancreaticojejunostomy
officialTitle: Randomised Prospective Study of Clinical Outcomes After Closed Suction Drainage and Natural Drainage of the Pancreatic Duct in Pancreaticojejunostomy After Pancreatoduodenectomy

interventions.name: closed suction drainage of pancreatic duct

summary: Pancreaticojejunal anastomosis leakage is a major complication after pancreatoduodenectomy and various technical methods have been examined to improve the situation.However, none of methods have been successful at improving results according to the findings of prospective randomized studies. We propose that active drainage of pancreatic juice using suction drainage might maximize the advantage of a stent and finally reduce pancreaticojejunal anastomosis leakage.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Patients With Pancreatic Fistula
